name: Customer Receivables
query:
SELECT 
    si.customer as "Customer:Link/Customer:200",
    c.customer_name as "Customer Name:Data:200",
    c.custom_mobile_number as "Mobile Number:Data:150",
    SUM(si.outstanding_amount) as "Outstanding Amount:Currency:150",
    COUNT(si.name) as "Open Invoices:Int:120",
    SUM(CASE WHEN si.outstanding_amount > 0 AND si.outstanding_amount < si.grand_total THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Partial Payments:Int:140",
    SUM(CASE WHEN si.outstanding_amount > 0 AND si.outstanding_amount < si.grand_total THEN si.outstanding_amount ELSE 0 END) as "Partial Amount:Currency:150"
FROM `tabSales Invoice` si
LEFT JOIN `tabCustomer` c ON si.customer = c.name
WHERE si.docstatus = 1 
    AND si.outstanding_amount > 0
    AND si.status != 'Paid'
GROUP BY si.customer, c.customer_name, c.custom_mobile_number
HAVING SUM(si.outstanding_amount) > 0
ORDER BY SUM(si.outstanding_amount) DESC
